mapper.select: select count(*) from review join campground cg on review.camp_id = cg.camp_id where cg.camp_id = #{camp_id};
select * from review join campground cg on review.camp_id = cg.camp_id where cg.camp_id = #{camp_id} ORDER BY review.created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
mapper.insert: insert into review ( user_id, camp_id, rating, reply, created_at) values (#{user_id}, #{camp_id}, #{rating}, #{reply}, NOW());
